page.title: 19Local Employment
page.content:
As stated earlier the main employer in the block is J. Wareing and Son. In addition to its original site the firm also uses buildings that were originally a corn mill beside the disused Railway Station. On this site there are also other small firms.
5 people are employed in a sheet metal forming unit which amongst other products makes parts for oil tankers. 3 people are employed in a small repair garage. 2 people are employed in a small photographic laboratory. 2 people manufacture sesonings to sell to food manufacturers. Finally 1 person has set up a printing business on the site.
